no_account_members: No account members in this hiring team
there_no_members_collab: There are no members collaborating on this job. You can add someone from your team or invite a new member.
invited_members_will_automatically: Invited members will automatically become collaborators for this job, once they sign up.
are_you_sure_remove_collaborator: Are you sure you want to remove this collaborator? This action cannot be undone.
want_your_colleagues: Want your colleagues to help you out or give you their opinion? Specify the collaborators for this job. You may pick one or more of the account members from the list below. Can't find some colleagues in the list? Invite them to join the account. Once they sign up, they will automatically have access to this job.
